title: Exclusive : Why SpaceX still bets on solar and what it means for suppliers
description: While Tesla's core electric-vehicle business is undergoing a structural recalibration, its longer-term bets—autonomous driving, artificial intelligence, and humanoid robots—remain firmly in the investment and incubation phase. The clearest source of momentum, however, came from an area that has drawn far less public attention: energy generation and storage. That business posted revenue growth of roughly 25% year over year, emerging as one of the report's brightest spots.
